segment.source: Managing UE-V 1.0 Settings Location Templates Using PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing UE-V 1.0 Settings Location Templates Using PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Managing UE-V 1.0 Settings Location Templates Using PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing UE-V 1.0 Settings Location Templates Using PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Managing UE-V 1.0 Settings Location Templates Using PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing UE-V 1.0 Settings Location Templates Using PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) uses settings location templates (XML files) that define the settings captured and applied by User Experience Virtualization.
segment.target: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) uses settings location templates (XML files) that define the settings captured and applied by User Experience Virtualization.

segment.source: UE-V includes a set of standard settings location templates.
segment.target: UE-V includes a set of standard settings location templates.

segment.source: It also includes the UE-V Generator tool that enables you to create custom settings location templates.
segment.target: It also includes the UE-V Generator tool that enables you to create custom settings location templates.

segment.source: After you create and deploy settings location templates you can manage those templates using PowerShell or WMI.
segment.target: After you create and deploy settings location templates you can manage those templates using PowerShell or WMI.

segment.source: Manage settings location templates with WMI and PowerShell
segment.target: Manage settings location templates with WMI and PowerShell

segment.source: The WMI and PowerShell features of UE-V include the ability to enable, disable, register, update, and unregister settings location templates.
segment.target: The WMI and PowerShell features of UE-V include the ability to enable, disable, register, update, and unregister settings location templates.

segment.source: By using these features, you can automate the process of registering, updating, or unregistering templates with the UE-V agent.
segment.target: By using these features, you can automate the process of registering, updating, or unregistering templates with the UE-V agent.

segment.source: You can also manually register templates using WMI and PowerShell commands.
segment.target: You can also manually register templates using WMI and PowerShell commands.

segment.source: By using these features in conjunction with an electronic software distribution solution, Group Policy, or another automated deployment method such as a script, you can further automate that process.
segment.target: By using these features in conjunction with an electronic software distribution solution, Group Policy, or another automated deployment method such as a script, you can further automate that process.

segment.source: You must have administrator permissions to update, register, or unregister a settings location template.
segment.target: You must have administrator permissions to update, register, or unregister a settings location template.

segment.source: Administrator permissions are not required to enable or disable templates.
segment.target: Administrator permissions are not required to enable or disable templates.

segment.source: To manage settings location templates with PowerShell
segment.target: To manage settings location templates with PowerShell

segment.source: Use an account with administrator rights to open a Windows PowerShell window.
segment.target: Use an account with administrator rights to open a Windows PowerShell window.

segment.source: To import the Microsoft UE-V PowerShell module, type the following command at the PowerShell command prompt.
segment.target: To import the Microsoft UE-V PowerShell module, type the following command at the PowerShell command prompt.

segment.source: Use the following PowerShell cmdlets to register and manage the UE-V settings location templates.
segment.target: Use the following PowerShell cmdlets to register and manage the UE-V settings location templates.

segment.source: PowerShell command
segment.target: PowerShell command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Get-UevTemplate
segment.target: Get-UevTemplate

segment.source: Lists all the settings location templates registered on the computer.
segment.target: Lists all the settings location templates registered on the computer.

segment.source: Register-UevTemplate
segment.target: Register-UevTemplate

segment.source: Registers a settings location template with UE-V.
segment.target: Registers a settings location template with UE-V.

segment.source: Once a template is registered, UE-V will synchronize the settings that are defined in the template between computers that have the template registered.
segment.target: Once a template is registered, UE-V will synchronize the settings that are defined in the template between computers that have the template registered.

segment.source: Unregister-UevTemplate
segment.target: Unregister-UevTemplate

segment.source: Unregisters a settings location template with UE-V.
segment.target: Unregisters a settings location template with UE-V.

segment.source: As soon as a template is unregistered, UE-V will no longer synchronize the settings that are defined in the template between computers.
segment.target: As soon as a template is unregistered, UE-V will no longer synchronize the settings that are defined in the template between computers.

segment.source: Update-UevTemplate
segment.target: Update-UevTemplate

segment.source: Updates a settings location template with a more recent version of the template.
segment.target: Updates a settings location template with a more recent version of the template.

segment.source: The new template should have a version that is later than the existing one.
segment.target: The new template should have a version that is later than the existing one.

segment.source: Disable-UevTemplate
segment.target: Disable-UevTemplate

segment.source: Disables a settings location template for the current user of the computer.
segment.target: Disables a settings location template for the current user of the computer.

segment.source: Enable-UevTemplate
segment.target: Enable-UevTemplate

segment.source: Enables a settings location template for the current user of the computer.
segment.target: Enables a settings location template for the current user of the computer.

segment.source: Test-UevTemplate
segment.target: Test-UevTemplate

segment.source: Determines whether a given settings location template complies with its XML schema.
segment.target: Determines whether a given settings location template complies with its XML schema.

segment.source: The UE-V PowerShell features allow you to manage a group of settings templates deployed in your enterprise.
segment.target: The UE-V PowerShell features allow you to manage a group of settings templates deployed in your enterprise.

segment.source: To manage a group of templates using PowerShell, do the following.
segment.target: To manage a group of templates using PowerShell, do the following.

segment.source: To manage a group of settings location templates with PowerShell
segment.target: To manage a group of settings location templates with PowerShell

segment.source: Modify or update the desired settings location templates.
segment.target: Modify or update the desired settings location templates.

segment.source: Deploy the desired settings location templates to a folder accessible to the local computer.
segment.target: Deploy the desired settings location templates to a folder accessible to the local computer.

segment.source: On the local computer, open a Windows PowerShell window with administrator rights.
segment.target: On the local computer, open a Windows PowerShell window with administrator rights.

segment.source: Import the Microsoft UE-V PowerShell module, by typing the following command.
segment.target: Import the Microsoft UE-V PowerShell module, by typing the following command.

segment.source: Unregister all the previously registered versions of the templates by typing the following command.
segment.target: Unregister all the previously registered versions of the templates by typing the following command.

segment.source: This will unregister all active templates on the computer.
segment.target: This will unregister all active templates on the computer.

segment.source: Register the updated templates by typing the following command.
segment.target: Register the updated templates by typing the following command.

segment.source: This will register all of the settings location templates located in the specified template folder.
segment.target: This will register all of the settings location templates located in the specified template folder.

segment.source: User Experience Virtualization provides the following set of WMI commands.
segment.target: User Experience Virtualization provides the following set of WMI commands.

segment.source: Administrators can use these interfaces to manage settings location templates from Windows PowerShell and automate template administrative tasks.
segment.target: Administrators can use these interfaces to manage settings location templates from Windows PowerShell and automate template administrative tasks.

segment.source: To manage settings location templates with WMI
segment.target: To manage settings location templates with WMI

segment.source: Use an account with administrator rights to open a Windows PowerShell window.
segment.target: Use an account with administrator rights to open a Windows PowerShell window.

segment.source: Use the following WMI commands to register and manage the UE-V settings location templates.
segment.target: Use the following WMI commands to register and manage the UE-V settings location templates.

segment.source: PowerShell command
segment.target: PowerShell command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV SettingsLocationTemplate | Select-Object TemplateId,TemplateName, TemplateVersion,Enabled | Format-Table -Autosize
segment.target: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV SettingsLocationTemplate | Select-Object TemplateId,TemplateName, TemplateVersion,Enabled | Format-Table -Autosize

segment.source: Lists all the settings location templates registered for the computer.
segment.target: Lists all the settings location templates registered for the computer.

segment.source: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name Register -ArgumentList template path
segment.target: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name Register -ArgumentList template path

segment.source: Registers a settings location template with UE-V.
segment.target: Registers a settings location template with UE-V.

segment.source: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name UnregisterByTemplateId -ArgumentList template ID
segment.target: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name UnregisterByTemplateId -ArgumentList template ID

segment.source: Unregisters a settings location template with UE-V.
segment.target: Unregisters a settings location template with UE-V.

segment.source: As soon as a template is unregistered, UE-V will no longer synchronize the settings that are defined in the template between computers.
segment.target: As soon as a template is unregistered, UE-V will no longer synchronize the settings that are defined in the template between computers.

segment.source: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name EnableByTemplateId -ArgumentList template ID
segment.target: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name EnableByTemplateId -ArgumentList template ID

segment.source: Enables a settings location template with UE-V
segment.target: Enables a settings location template with UE-V

segment.source: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name DisableByTemplateId -ArgumentList template ID
segment.target: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name DisableByTemplateId -ArgumentList template ID

segment.source: Disables a settings location template with UE-V
segment.target: Disables a settings location template with UE-V

segment.source: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name Update -ArgumentList template path
segment.target: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name Update -ArgumentList template path

segment.source: Updates a settings location template with UE-V.
segment.target: Updates a settings location template with UE-V.

segment.source: The new template should have a version that is higher than the existing one.
segment.target: The new template should have a version that is higher than the existing one.

segment.source: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name Validate -ArgumentList template path
segment.target: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class SettingsLocationTemplate -Name Validate -ArgumentList template path

segment.source: Determines whether a given settings location template complies with its XML schema.
segment.target: Determines whether a given settings location template complies with its XML schema.

segment.source: How to deploy the UE-V agent with PowerShell
segment.target: How to deploy the UE-V agent with PowerShell

segment.source: Stage the UE-V installer file in an accessible network share.
segment.target: Stage the UE-V installer file in an accessible network share.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Use AgentSetup.exe to deploy both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the UE-V Agent.
segment.target: Use AgentSetup.exe to deploy both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the UE-V Agent.

segment.source: Windows Installer Files versions, AgentSetupx86.msi and AgentSetupx64.msi, are available for each architecture.
segment.target: Windows Installer Files versions, AgentSetupx86.msi and AgentSetupx64.msi, are available for each architecture.

segment.source: To uninstall the UE-V Agent at a later time using the installation file, you must use the same file type.
segment.target: To uninstall the UE-V Agent at a later time using the installation file, you must use the same file type.

segment.source: Use one of the following PowerShell commands to install the agent.
segment.target: Use one of the following PowerShell commands to install the agent.
